extendedInfo.description: Cyber Defense is an "arena" style tower defense game in which you battle to prevent your Android device from being overwhelmed by malware.  Viruses, trojans, worms and all manner of other infections must be stopped from reaching your CPU by deploying a maze of various types of antivirus towers.Have fun!Coming soonish:- new virus types- speed up save game function; it's too slow at the moment- game performance tweaks- 2x game speed function- social network integration for global highscores and achievements

reviews.title: A very good tower defense game
reviews.comment: I have wasted many fun hours building little mazes and killing viruses.
reviews.author: Nate Parker

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: This game remains challenging, even after one has \"figured out\" a strategy for a level. I like that it keeps making you think and plan and time.

reviews.title: Forcecloses
reviews.comment: I get into the game and it force closes.  Didn\'t save my game when it force closed when I saved it.  I got fed up so I uninstalled it.

reviews.title: Passei a primeira tela.
reviews.comment: Pra quem \303\251 novato em TD pode ser dif\303\255cil, tive que criar um labirinto de armas. Achei os desenhos muito quadrados, talvez por ser no meu celular de baixa resolu\303\247\303\243o. N\303\243o \303\251 dos melhor mas foi legal. E o som dos lasers tamb\303\251m. 2 a 3* _ Cheguei no final da tela Easy n\303\243o d\303\241 vontade de jogar mais. Deletei.

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: Very fun and addictive. GREAT game!!!  Force close issue on Droid X is fixed. Thanks for taking care of that so quickly! Your games are the best.
